In pictures

  • Denmark
    Queen Margrethe hosts new years reception for last time

    Europes current longest-reigning monarch, Queen Margrethe, rode through Denmarks capital in a gilded, horse-drawn coach as she concluded her last new year celebrations before abdicating later this month. Thousands braved freezing temperatures, strong winds, snow and sleet to cheer the queen along the route in Copenhagen. She will step down on 14 January after 52 years
